briefTitle: Open-label Extension (OLE) Study of Plecanatide for Chronic Idiopathic Constipation (CIC)
officialTitle: An Open-Label Extension (OLE), Long-term Safety and Tolerability Study of Plecanatide in Patients With Chronic Idiopathic Constipation (CIC)
summary: This is a multi-center, open-label, 52-week safety and tolerability study of plecanatide in patients with Chronic Idiopathic Constipation (CIC).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With at Least One Treatment-Emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose up to 72 weeks
